title: Leavebuster
body:
hello to whoever is reading this
 can someone tell me how many times you get leavebuster in order to get banned? 

thanks

replies.body: A [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty won't happen if it's only one leave.  A history of leaves though can apply a lower priority queue.  Check out that guide, and let me know if you have any questions!

Yes, I have a question. I'm wondering how many times do you have to get leaverbuster in order to get banned or suspended.

So like, if I were to get low-priority queue for 20 minutes once, and then I leave 1 more game, would that get me a suspension?

Or does it just depend on the consistency of leaving games in order to get banned or suspended?

Hey there, Leaverbuster won't penalize you for just one game but anything after that is free game.  If your leaves are consistent or have a history of leaving, then you face the risk of having your lower priority queue escalated.  We won't really suspend you unless the leaves are intentional, but the down time period is a chance for you to troubleshoot whatever is causing you to leave.
Ohhh, I understand now. Thank you.
there is no exact data , it depends on how long , how often and how many bans you get
